component.text: Roll over each packet to view the different EIGRP packet types.

Update:
  • If new neighbor found - unicast
  • To indicate routing change - multicast

Query:
  • To request specific info about a neighbor or multicast looking for new successor
  • Can be multicast or unicast

Acknowledgement:
  • Unicast hello packets with no data
  • Response to reliable packet transfer; update, request, reply

Hello:
  • Discover & verify neighbors
  • Discover timer values
  • Multicast 224.0.0.10
  • Unreliable transfer method
